title: Current - resistor current and electron directions

content.prompt: A resistor is connected by wires to a battery, as shown in the figure. What are the directions of the current and the net motion of electrons in the resistor?

choices.label: The current is to the left and the net electron motion is to the right.
The current is to the right and the net electron motion is to the left.
Both the current and the net electron motion are to the left.
Both the current and the net electron motion are to the right.
